typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MovieADLS
MovieADLS select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(year) > 1950) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(PrimaryGenre = iif(locate('|', genres)>1,left(genres,locate('|', genres)-1),genres),
		year = year) ~> DerivedPrimaryGenre
DerivedPrimaryGenre sort(desc({Rotten Tomato}, true)) ~> SortMovies
SortMovies rank(desc({Rotten Tomato}, true),
	output({Rotten Tomato} as long)) ~> RankMoviesByRatings
RankMoviesByRatings aggregate(AverageRating = avg(toInteger({Rotten Tomato})),
		HighestRead = first(title),
		LowestRead = last(title),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRatings
AggregateRatings alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
